product_name: Showers Pass Refuge Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: With waterproof, breathable protection and features such as core vents and a drop-down tail, the Showers Pass Refuge bike jacket can also handle skiing or mountaineering adventures. Lightweight nylon fabric with 3-layer waterproof, breathable laminate blocks wind and rain; jacket is fully seam-sealed for complete protection. Drop-down hem with snap closure ensures full coverage while cycling or sitting on chairlifts; simply fold up the hem and use snaps to secure it for a shorter, conventional hem. Extra-long zippered core vents allow custom ventilation; reinforced shoulders provide extra durability when wearing a pack. Adjustable, removable hood is helmet-compatible. The Showers Pass Refuge jacket features hand pockets, a zippered rear pocket and zippered chest pocket with an audio port.
